item.title: KSQL, a horror tale
item.description: After spending several weeks working on a ksql solution to filter billions of events and determine their destination topic, I was disappointed to find that it did not live up to my expectations. I had hoped for a more robust product that would align with our needs. Previously, we utilized a similar filter in Spark, incurring traffic costs for both Confluent and AWS. With kSQL, the advantage was that we could avoid paying for AWS traffic.
